description:
USN-5473-1 updated ca-certificates. This update provides
the corresponding update for Ubuntu 16.04 ESM.

Original advisory details:

 The ca-certificates package contained outdated CA certificates. This update
 refreshes the included certificates to those contained in the 2.50 version
 of the Mozilla certificate authority bundle.
title: ca-certificates update
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary: The CA certificates in the ca-certificates package were updated.
